name: EPOXIBOND™ EB-316TM
description: EB-316TM is a thixotropic version of EB-316M, a high strength, semi-rigid epoxy adhesive. This tough adhesive has an excellent combination of shear and peel strength. It has also excellent impact and vibration resistance and low temperature flexibility. This high-performance medical grade epoxy adhesive passes 500 thermal cycles from - 50°C to 150°C. EB-316M is excellent for cryogenic temperature applications.
